m_szDocTitle: Daimler continues along successful path: record figures for unit sales, revenue and earnings in
m_szDocSumamry: STUTTGART, Germany, Feb. 4, 2016 /PRNewswire/ -- Record unit sales with 2.9 million vehicles sold (+12%) Group revenue up by 15% to €149.5 billion (2014: €129.9 billion) Substantial increase in Group EBIT to €13.5 billion (2014: €10.8 billion) EBIT from ongoing business substantially higher than prior year at €13.8 billion (2014: €10.1 billion) Net profit of €8.9 billion (2014: €7.3 billion) Highest ever dividend proposed of €3.25 per share (2014: €2.45) Outlook 2016: growth expected in unit sales, revenue and EBIT from ongoing business Daimler AG (ticker symbol DAI) grew profitably once again
